text: Belle's Magical World (also called Beauty and the Beast: Belle's Magical World) is a 1998 American direct-to-video Disney midquel movie. It is the 3rd in the Beauty and the Beast trilogy. It was first released on January 13, 1998. title: Belle's Magical World
